item.description: Hi! Looking for something different to do this Saturday? What??? Never country danced before? No worry there as Michelle will give you some fun basic lessons to get you on your feet. The dances taught at 7:30 will be reviewed during the band's first break of the evening. Come on.....you know you want to try it......besides its fun! Wolfcreek will get you up and mov'in....join us at the meetup table near the bar or find your own spot with your friends. Make time for a foot stomp'in evening in air conditioning. YEEEEHAWWW!
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
